hairstyles.name: Bob Cut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Trim every 6-8 weeks to maintain shape. Use smoothing serum for sleek finish.

hairstyles.name: Short Pixie
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Requires frequent trims every 3-4 weeks. Style with texture paste for definition.

hairstyles.name: Double Bun
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use hair ties that won't damage hair. Apply light hold hairspray to control flyaways.

hairstyles.name: Elegant Updo
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use bobby pins matching hair color. Apply texturizing spray before styling for better hold.

hairstyles.name: Pixie Cut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Style with lightweight wax. Trim every 4-6 weeks to maintain shape.

hairstyles.name: Long Curly
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use curl-defining cream. Deep condition weekly. Avoid brushing when dry.

hairstyles.name: Curly Bob
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use diffuser when drying. Apply curl cream to damp hair. Refresh curls with water spray.

hairstyles.name: Long Straight
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use heat protectant before styling. Regular trims every 8-10 weeks for healthy ends.

hairstyles.name: Long Wavy
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use sea salt spray for texture. Scrunch hair while drying. Sleep with loose braids.

hairstyles.name: High Ponytail
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use smoothing serum before tying. Wrap hair around elastic to hide it.

hairstyles.name: Dreadlocks
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Wash weekly with residue-free shampoo. Palm roll regularly. Keep scalp moisturized.

hairstyles.name: Shoulder Length
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Perfect length for various styles. Trim every 6-8 weeks. Use leave-in conditioner.

hairstyles.name: Buzz Cut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Trim every 2-3 weeks. Use sunscreen on scalp. Minimal styling needed.

hairstyles.name: Undercut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Trim sides every 2-3 weeks. Style top with pomade or wax.

hairstyles.name: Pompadour
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Blow dry with round brush. Use strong hold pomade. Regular trims for shape.

hairstyles.name: Slick Back
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use gel or pomade on damp hair. Comb back while blow drying.

hairstyles.name: Faux Hawk
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Style center upward with strong hold gel. Trim sides regularly.

hairstyles.name: Spiky Hair
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use matte clay or wax. Style with fingers for texture. Works best with shorter hair.

hairstyles.name: Comb Over
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Create clear part line. Use light pomade. Comb regularly throughout day.

hairstyles.name: High Tight Fade
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Fade touch-ups every 2 weeks. Keep top moisturized. Line up edges regularly.

hairstyles.name: Man Bun
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Keep hair healthy with conditioner. Use hair tie without metal. Position bun at crown.

hairstyles.name: Afro
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Moisturize daily. Use wide-tooth comb. Shape with afro pick.

hairstyles.name: Low Fade
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Fade maintenance every 3 weeks. Style top as desired. Works with various top styles.

hairstyles.name: Textured Fringe
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use texture spray or sea salt spray. Tousle with fingers. Trim fringe every 4 weeks.

hairstyles.name: Messy Tousled
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Apply matte paste to damp hair. Scrunch and let air dry. Embrace the natural texture.

hairstyles.name: Two Block
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Regular trims to maintain contrast. Style top with wax. Popular in Asian styling.

hairstyles.name: Japanese Short
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Regular trims for precision. Use smoothing serum for sleek finish.

hairstyles.name: Spiked
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use strong hold gel. Style with fingers pointing upward.

hairstyles.name: Bowl Cut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Precise trimming needed. Use smoothing products for clean lines.

hairstyles.name: Chignon
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use bobby pins and hairspray. Perfect for formal occasions.

hairstyles.name: Slicked Back
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use gel or pomade. Comb back from hairline.

hairstyles.name: Stacked Curls Bob
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use curl enhancing products. Diffuse dry for volume.

hairstyles.name: Side Part High Fade
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Regular fade maintenance. Style with pomade for definition.

hairstyles.name: Wavy French Bob
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use wave enhancing products. Pin curls for authentic 1920s look.

hairstyles.name: Short Twintails
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use small elastic bands. Add ribbons or accessories for extra charm.

hairstyles.name: Short Curly Pixie
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use curl cream on damp hair. Scrunch for definition.

hairstyles.name: Fishtail Braid
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Start with textured hair. Pull gently for fuller appearance.

hairstyles.name: Twin Braids
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Keep braids even. Use edge control for neat parts.

hairstyles.name: Cornrows
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Moisturize scalp regularly. Wrap at night with silk scarf.

hairstyles.name: Loose Curly Afro
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Deep condition weekly. Use wide-tooth comb when wet only.

hairstyles.name: Long Twintails
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use soft hair ties. Brush gently to prevent breakage.

hairstyles.name: Long Hime Cut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Requires precise cutting. Straighten for authentic look.

hairstyles.name: Box Braids
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Moisturize scalp. Can last 6-8 weeks with proper care.

hairstyles.name: French Bangs
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Trim every 3 weeks. Style with round brush for soft curve.

hairstyles.name: Medium Long Layered
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Regular trims to maintain layers. Use volumizing products.

hairstyles.name: Buzz Cut (Female)
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Trim every 2 weeks. Moisturize scalp daily.

hairstyles.name: Curly Shag
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use curl cream. Air dry for natural texture.

hairstyles.name: Wavy Shag
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use sea salt spray. Scrunch while drying.

hairstyles.name: Undercut Long Hair
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Maintain undercut every 3 weeks. Tie up or style down.

hairstyles.name: Blunt Bowl Cut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Requires precise cutting. Use smoothing products.

hairstyles.name: Long Wavy Curtain
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Part in middle. Use wave enhancing products.

hairstyles.name: Cornrow Braids
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Keep scalp moisturized. Wrap with durag at night.

hairstyles.name: Long Hair Tied Up
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use conditioner regularly. Various tie-up styles possible.

hairstyles.name: Tinfoil Perm
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use curl-specific products. Avoid over-brushing.

hairstyles.name: Chestnut
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Regular conditioning. Enhance natural color with gloss.

hairstyles.name: Choppy Bangs
hairstyles.maintenanceTips: Use texture paste. Trim bangs every 3-4 weeks.
